In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapons [[Vortex Vanquisher]] (Polearm) and [[The Unforged]] (Claymore) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

In this event wish, the 4-star weapons [[Lion's Roar]] (Sword), [[The Bell]] (Claymore), [[Favonius Codex]] (Catalyst), [[Favonius Warbow]] (Bow), and [[Dragon's Bane]] (Polearm) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapon will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."

For information about rates, see [[Wishes]].
